attributes.action: We the undersigned, petition the Soverign British Government to get out of Europe
attributes.additional_details:
The European membership of Great Britain is a scandalous waste of money and a calamitous sacrifice of Soverignty.

The European project is not working, Britain needs to leave immediately.

European law is bureaucratic, wasteful and inflexible, one size does not fit all.

The concept that Britain cannot govern itself is laughable, we did so for hundreds of years without any problem.

We have been promised an in/out referendum by successive governments. Where is it?

Give us a referendum and let the British public decide.
